会員権: (かいいんけん) - membership; membership rights; franchise; seat (e.g. stock exchange)
会員登録: (かいいんとうろく) - membership registration; subscription; member enrolment
会員規約: (かいいんきやく) - membership agreement (e.g. for a credit card)
会堂: (かいどう) - church; chapel; synagogue; tabernacle
会堂司: (かいどうづかさ) - ruler of a synagogue
会場: (かいじょう) - assembly hall; meeting place; venue; grounds
会場内: (かいじょうない) - inside a meeting place
会席: (かいせき) - meeting place/seats for the public; restaurant dinner tray/set of dishes served on an individual tray for entertaining guests/banquet
会席料理: (かいせきりょうり) - set of dishes served on an individual tray for entertaining guests; banquet
会席膳: (かいせきぜん) - elaborate dinner tray
会式: (えしき) - memorial service/temple service; (Nichiren Buddhism) memorial service for Nichiren (13th day of 10th month)
会得: (えとく) - understanding; comprehension; grasp; perception; appreciation; mastery (of an art or skill)
会心の一撃: (かいしんのいちげき) - critical hit (esp. in RPGs)
会心の作: (かいしんのさく) - work after one's heart
会心の友: (かいしんのとも) - kindred soul; congenial friend
会心の笑みを浮かべる: (かいしんのえみをうかべる) - to smile a smile of satisfaction
会意: (かいい) - compound ideograph formation (one of the six kanji classifications); making kanji up of meaningful parts (e.g. "mountain pass" is up + down + mountain)
会意文字: (かいいもじ) - compound ideograph (one of the six kanji classifications); kanji made up of meaningful parts (e.g. "mountain pass" is up + down + mountain)
会期不継続の原則: (かいきふけいぞくのげんそく) - principle holding that any matters left unresolved at the end of one Diet session are not to be carried over to the next
会期中: (かいきちゅう) - during a session (of the legislature)
会社ごろ: (かいしゃごろ) - extortionist that blackmail corporations; corporate shakedown artist
会社に出る: (かいしゃにでる) - to go to the office; to be at work
会社の不存在: (かいしゃのふそんざい) - non-existence of a business corporation
会社の主: (かいしゃのぬし) - great old-timer of the firm
会社を起こす: (かいしゃをおこす) - to set up a company
会社を辞める: (かいしゃをやめる) - to leave the company
会社ゴロ: (かいしゃゴロ) - extortionist that blackmail corporations; corporate shakedown artist
会社人間: (かいしゃにんげん) - (yoji) company person; company man; company woman; corporate soldier
会社勤め: (かいしゃづとめ) - working for a company; being employed by a company
会社名: (かいしゃめい) - company name; corporate name
会社営業: (かいしゃえいぎょう) - business administration
会社情報: (かいしゃじょうほう) - corporate information
会社持ち: (かいしゃもち) - at company's expense
会社更生法: (かいしゃこうせいほう) - Corporate Rehabilitation Law
会社概要: (かいしゃがいよう) - company overview
会社法: (かいしゃほう) - corporation law; company law
会社立: (かいしゃりつ) - established by the company
会社経営: (かいしゃけいえい) - company management; managing a company
会社説明会: (かいしゃせつめいかい) - company information session
会社都合退職: (かいしゃつごうたいしょく) - leaving at the convenience of the company
会者定離: (えしゃじょうり) - (yoji) those who meet must part (suggesting the transient nature of this life); we meet only to part
会舘: (かいかん) - meeting hall; assembly hall
会葬: (かいそう) - attendance at a funeral
会葬者: (かいそうしゃ) - attendants at a funeral; mourners
会見場: (かいけんじょう) - location of a press conference; press conference room
会見記: (かいけんき) - record of an interview
会計: (かいけい) - account; finance; accountant; treasurer; paymaster; reckoning; bill
会計係: (かいけいけい) - accountant; accounting clerk; cashier; treasurer
会計処理: (かいけいしょり) - accounting; (the) accounting process; account processing
会計報告: (かいけいほうこく) - treasurer's report; financial report
会計学: (かいけいがく) - study of accountancy
会計情報システム: (かいけいじょうほうシステム) - accounting information system; AIS
会計検査院: (かいけいけんさいん) - Board of Audit
会話コーパス: (かいわコーパス) - dialogue corpus (dialog); dialogue corpora
会話力: (かいわりょく) - conversational ability; speaking ability
会話型処理: (かいわけいしょり) - conversational processing
会話型言語: (かいわけいげんご) - conversational language
会話形: (かいわがた) - conversational mode; interactive mode
会談: (かいだん) - conversation; conference (usu. between important people); discussion; interview

会議に加わる: (かいぎにくわわる) - to take part in a conference
会議場: (かいぎじょう) - conference room; place of assembly
会議室: (かいぎしつ) - conference room; council room
